text:
After Race 3 Debacle, Salman Khan Is Back With ‘Bharat’ & People Are Going Gaga Over The Teaser
After Race 3 Debacle, Salman Khan Is Back With ‘Bharat’ & People Are Going Gaga Over The Teaser
After Race 3 failed miserably at the box office, Salman Khan fans were disappointed. Salman Khan also had to bear the brunt for the same. And hence, for his next titled Bharat, he left no stone unturned to ensure it does not turn out to be a disaster like his last Eid release.
Twitter
Finally, the first teaser of Bharat, which also stars Katrina Kaif in the lead role is out, and people have gone berserk after watching it. In the Ali Abbas Zafar directoral, Salman Khan can be seen in different avatars. From a daredevil motorcyclist who is performing some breath-taking stunts to a Navy officer, Salman Khan can also be seen as an ageing boxer in the movie.
Me, making different email IDs to get Free Netflix subscription for a month. #BharatKaTeaser pic.twitter.com/HFo2mlHvPL — SAGAR (@sagarcasm) January 25, 2019
Without further ado, watch the Bharat teaser below.
Don't Miss 812 SHARES 3 K SHARES 699 SHARES 4 K SHARES 449 SHARES
Fans are going bonkers over the teaser.
Ammazinnggg, terrific teaser i have ever seen in my life,
Always all time blockbuster #BharatKaTeaser #SalmanKhan #BharatEid2019 — mohammed sayed (@BeingHu69330864) January 25, 2019
#BharatTeaser 🔥🔥
Jeete Hai Shaan se #SalmanKhan Fan ke naam se
We Luv u @BeingSalmanKhan Till Our Lst Brth
JAI SALMAN KHAN pic.twitter.com/lMGbcnxeiC — SHAHID Sᴀʟᴍᴀɴɪsᴛᴀɴ (@SSALMANISTAN) January 25, 2019
Isko bolte hai Toofaan 🔥🔥 another Blockbuster on its way
Jeete hai shaan se #SalmanKhan Fan ke naam se
We Luv u @BeingSalmanKhan Till Our Last Brth pic.twitter.com/rHbGxgBJGM — SHAHID Sᴀʟᴍᴀɴɪsᴛᴀɴ (@SSALMANISTAN) January 25, 2019
Jag Ghoomeya thaare jaisa naa koi :D
Jabardast ekdum #BharatkaTeaser _/_ — Its Raj..! (@LoyalSalmanFan1) January 25, 2019
Salman is real king in Bollywood — Amit Dhiraj Nandu (@nandu_amit) January 25, 2019
Omg it's sooooooo good. You are something else 🔥🔥🔥 Can't wait 🙌😍🎉 #BharatKaTeaser — Sana (@SanaAfsal) January 25, 2019
Bharat is Salman Khan’s third collaboration with Ali Abbas Zafar after Sultan and Tiger Zinda Hai. The movie also stars Tabu, Varun Dhawan, Jackie Shroff, Sunil Grover and Disha Patani in prominent roles.
title: After Race 3 Debacle, Salman Khan Is Back With ‘Bharat’ & People Are Going Gaga Over The Teaser
